title: Shaq Talks Back
description: The Los Angeles Laker's center and media celebrity tells all, from his early days as the "knucklehead in Orlando" to his rivalries with Alonzo Mourning and Patrick Ewing, as he describes his larger-than-life career in the NBA, in a memoir that has updated to include the 2000-2001 championship season. Reprint.
author: Shaquille O'Neal
